widgets.title: HTTP Response Time
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(tomcat.global.request.mean) FROM Metric RAW TIMESERIES FACET `service.name` LIMIT 10 SINCE 1800 seconds ago

widgets.title: HTTP Throughput
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(http.server.requests.count) FROM Metric RAW TIMESERIES FACET `service.name` LIMIT 10 SINCE 1800 seconds ago

widgets.title: Owners Created
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(petclinic.owner.count) as 'Owners Created' FROM Metric WHERE (method = 'POST' and status = '201') SINCE 1800 seconds ago RAW

widgets.title: Owners Updated
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(petclinic.owner.count) as 'Owners Updated' WHERE (method = 'PUT' AND status = '204') SINCE 1800 seconds ago RAW

widgets.title: Pets Created
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(petclinic.pet.count) as 'Pets Created' FROM Metric RAW SINCE today

widgets.title: Visits Created
widgets.nrql: FROM Metric SELECT sum(petclinic.visit.count) as 'Visits Created' SINCE 1800 seconds ago RAW

widgets.title: Requests by path
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`http.server.requests.count`) facet uri RAW

widgets.title: Errors by path
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`http.server.requests.count`) where exception != 'None' facet uri, `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: Mean request time by response code
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`http.server.requests.mean`) TIMESERIES facet status RAW

widgets.title: JVM GC Pause Time
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`jvm.gc.pause.max`) timeseries FACET `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: JDBC Connection Usage
widgets.nrql: select max(`hikaricp.connections.usage.max`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: Connection Pool Connections
widgets.nrql: select max(`hikaricp.connections.max`) FROM Metric TIMESERIES FACET `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: System Load Average
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`system.load.average.1m`) timeseries FACET `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: Process CPU Usage (%)
widgets.nrql: From Metric SELECT max(process.cpu.usage) timeseries FACET `service.name` RAW

widgets.title: Mean request time by path
widgets.nrql: from Metric SELECT max(`http.server.requests.mean`) TIMESERIES facet uri RAW
